name: Speedrun Maze
description:
I was asked to make a game made specifically for speed running

So I kinda just threw together two sets of random mazes with buttons that need to be pressed. After pressing all the buttons, find the door at the end to continue.

Recommend playing this game with your friends and trying to get the best time among them.
